languages.text: "Как будет угодно Вашей Милости..." {n}Губернатор опускает голову в скованном поклоне.{/n} "Поговорите со мной, когда будете готовы огласить свое решение".

traits.locale_text: "Как будет угодно Вашей Милости..." {n}Губернатор опускает голову в скованном поклоне.{/n} "Поговорите со мной, когда будете готовы огласить свое решение".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."
languages.original_text: "Как будет угодно Вашей Милости..." {n}Губернатор опускает голову в скованном поклоне.{/n} "Поговорите со мной, когда будете готовы огласить свое решение".

traits.locale_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The Governor lowers his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「仰せのままに、陛下…」{n}総督は深々と頭を下げて、かしこまった一礼をする。{/n}「陛下の判断を知らせる用意ができたら、私にお声がけください」
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."

traits.locale_text: 「仰せのままに、陛下…」{n}総督は深々と頭を下げて、かしこまった一礼をする。{/n}「陛下の判断を知らせる用意ができたら、私にお声がけください」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “遵命，大人……”{n}总督低下头，有些僵硬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“如果您准备宣布判决，请告诉我。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人……”{n}总督低下头，有些僵硬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“如果您准备宣布判决，请告诉我。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie,{n}répond le gouverneur en inclinant la tête avec raideur.{/n} Revenez me voir lorsque vous serez {mf|prêt|prête} à rendre votre verdict. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie,{n}répond le gouverneur en inclinant la tête avec raideur.{/n} Revenez me voir lorsque vous serez {mf|prêt|prête} à rendre votre verdict. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Sus deseos son órdenes, mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}El gobernador baja la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n} «Cuando esté {mf|listo|lista} para anunciar el veredicto, dígamelo».
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."

traits.locale_text: «Sus deseos son órdenes, mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}El gobernador baja la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n} «Cuando esté {mf|listo|lista} para anunciar el veredicto, dígamelo».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Der Gouverneur verneigt sich steif.{/n} "Sprecht mit mir, wenn Ihr bereit seid, Euer Urteil zu verkünden."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Der Gouverneur verneigt sich steif.{/n} "Sprecht mit mir, wenn Ihr bereit seid, Euer Urteil zu verkünden."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..." {n}Vali, başıyla beraber kabaca eğiliyor.{/n} "Kararınızı açıklamaya hazır olduğunuz vakit bana haber verebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The governor inclines his head in a stiff bow.{/n} "Speak to me when you are ready to announce your verdict."
